title: Apple shaved $200 million from Beats deal thanks to Dr. Dre
content:
Back in 2014, Apple made a monumental acquisition, purchasing Beats Music and Beats Electronics for a hefty sum of three billion dollars. Saying thatÂ Beats co-founders Jimmy Iovine and Dr. Dre made quite a bit of money from the deal would be an understatement. But, despite both of them fattening their pockets, it looks like it

The post Apple shaved $200 million from Beats deal thanks to Dr. Dre appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple's purchase of Beats was monumental. But it now appears that Apple was able to shave $200 million from the deal thanks to Dr. Dre.
